**HELP** Hi {name}, welcome to the Telegram Price Bot.
ℹ️ Here is the list of supported commands.
• **/help** : show this message • **/alive** : show if bot is active • **/pricebot_set_test_mode** __true/false__ : enable/disable test mode • **/pricebot_is_test_mode** : show if test mode is enabled • **/pricebot_version** : show bot version • **/pricebot_get_single** __COIN_ID COIN_VS LAST_DAYS [SAME_MSG]__ : show chart and price information of the specified pair (single call) • **/pricebot_task_start** __PERIOD_HOURS START_HOUR COIN_ID COIN_VS LAST_DAYS__ : start a price task in the current chat • **/pricebot_task_stop** __COIN_ID COIN_VS__ : stop the specified price task in the current chat • **/pricebot_task_stop_all** : stop all price tasks in the current chat • **/pricebot_task_pause** __COIN_ID COIN_VS__ : pause the specified price task in the current chat • **/pricebot_task_resume** __COIN_ID COIN_VS__ : resume the specified price task in the current chat • **/pricebot_task_send_in_same_msg** __COIN_ID COIN_VS true/false__ : enable/disable sending chart and price information in the same message for the specified price task in the current chat • **/pricebot_task_delete_last_msg** __COIN_ID COIN_VS true/false__ : enable/disable the deletion of last messages for the specified price task in the current chat • **/pricebot_task_info** : show the list of active price tasks in the current chat
Parameters in square brakets are optional.
**STATUS** ✅ The bot is alive.
**TEST MODE** ✅ Test mode enabled.
**TEST MODE** ✅ Test mode disabled.
**TEST MODE** ℹ️ Test mode is currently enabled.
**TEST MODE** ℹ️ Test mode is currently disabled.

**Telegram Crypto Price Bot**
Author: Emanuele Bellocchia (ebellocchia@gmail.com) Version: **{version}**

**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task successfully started.
Parameters: - Period: __{period}h__ - Start: __{start:02d}:00__ - Coin ID: __{coin_id}__ - Coin VS: __{coin_vs}__ - Last days: __{last_days}__
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] successfully stopped.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ All price tasks successfully stopped.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] successfully paused.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] successfully resumed.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] send chart/price in the same message set to: {flag}.
**TASK CONTROL** ✅ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] delete last message set to: {flag}.
**TASKS INFO** Number of active tasks in this chat: **{tasks_num}** Tasks list: {tasks_list}
**TASKS INFO** No task is active in this chat.
Hi! Thanks for choosing the **Telegram Crypto Price Bot**. Use __/help__ to see the list of supported commands. Do not forget to **make me administrator of the group** or I won't work properly.
**ERROR** ❌ An error occurred while executing command.
**ERROR** ❌ You are not authorized to use the command.
**ERROR** ❌ This command can be executed only in the chat group.
**ERROR** ❌ API error for coin {coin_id}/{coin_vs}, check network or coin ID.
**ERROR** ❌ Invalid parameters.
**ERROR** ❌ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] is already active in this chat. Stop the task to start a new one with the same coins again.
**ERROR** ❌ Price task [{coin_id}, {coin_vs}] is not active in this chat.
**ERROR** ❌ Period shall be between 1 and 24.
**ERROR** ❌ Start hour shall be between 0 and 23.
**ERROR** ❌ Maximum number of tasks reached. Stop some tasks to start new ones.
